00012 #include <QIODevice>

00015 RelationWriter::RelationWriter(OsmData *data, QIODevice *output, SrtmDownloader *downloader)
00016 {
00017     this->data = data;
00018     this->output = output;
00019     relationId = -1;
00020     this->downloader = downloader;
00021 }
00022 
00024 void RelationWriter::writeRelations()
00025 {
00026     output->write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n"
00027         "<osm version=\"0.6\" generator=\"SRTM2Wayinfo\">\n");
00028     OsmWay way;
00029     data->ways->startReading();
00030     while (data->ways->get(way)) {
00031         processWay(&way);
00032     }
00033     output->write("</osm>\n");
00034 }
00035 
00039 void RelationWriter::processWay(OsmWay *way)
00040 {
00041     OsmNodeId startNode = 0, lastNode = 0; //No node 0 exists
00042     float length = 0, up = 0, down = 0;
00043     OsmNodeId id;
00044     foreach (id, way->nodes) {
00045         if (startNode == 0) {
00046             startNode = id;
00047             lastNode = id;
00048             continue;
00049         }
00050         calc(lastNode, id, &length, &up, &down);
00051         lastNode = id;
00052         if ((*data->nodes)[id].isIntersection()) {
00053             writeRelation(way->id, startNode, id, length, up, down);
00054             startNode = id;
00055             length = 0;
00056             up = 0;
00057             down = 0;
00058         }
00059     }
00060     if (startNode != id) {
00061         //Write info for last segment of way
00062         writeRelation(way->id, startNode, id, length, up, down);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00067 void RelationWriter::writeRelation(OsmWayId wayId, OsmNodeId startNode, OsmNodeId endNode, float length, float up, float down)
00068 {
00069     //Note: QString::arg is not locale dependent except if the parameter is written as %L1
00070     QString text =
00071         QString("<relation id=\"%1\" visible=\"true\">\n"
00072         "\t<member type=\"way\" ref=\"%2\" role=\"\"/>\n"
00073         "\t<member type=\"node\" ref=\"%3\" role=\"from\"/>\n"
00074         "\t<member type=\"node\" ref=\"%4\" role=\"to\"/>\n"
00075         "\t<tag k=\"length\" v=\"%5\"/>\n"
00076         "\t<tag k=\"up\" v=\"%6\"/>\n"
00077         "\t<tag k=\"down\" v=\"%7\"/>\n"
00078         "\t<tag k=\"type\" v=\"altitude\">\n"
00079         "</relation>\n").arg(relationId--).arg(wayId).arg(startNode).arg(endNode).arg(length, 3, 'f').arg(up, 3, 'f').arg(down, 4, 'f');
00080     output->write(text.toAscii());
00081 }
00082 
00084 void RelationWriter::calc(OsmNodeId from, OsmNodeId to, float *length, float *up, float *down)
00085 {
00086     *length += distance((*data->nodes)[from].lat(), (*data->nodes)[from].lon(), (*data->nodes)[to].lat(), (*data->nodes)[to].lon());
00087     calcUpDown((*data->nodes)[from].lat(), (*data->nodes)[from].lon(), (*data->nodes)[to].lat(), (*data->nodes)[to].lon(), up, down);
00088 }
00089 
00095 void RelationWriter::calcUpDown(float from_lat, float from_lon, float to_lat, float to_lon, float *up, float *down)
00096 {
00097     float dist = distance(from_lat, from_lon, to_lat, to_lon);
00098     if (dist < MAX_DIST) {
00099         float alt_from = downloader->getAltitudeFromLatLon(from_lat, from_lon);
00100         float alt_to   = downloader->getAltitudeFromLatLon(to_lat, to_lon);
00101         if (alt_from == SRTM_DATA_VOID || alt_to == SRTM_DATA_VOID) return; //Do nothing when no data is available.
00102         float diff = alt_to - alt_from;
00103         if (diff > 0.0) {
00104             *up += diff;
00105         } else {
00106             *down -= diff;
00107         }
00108     } else {
00109         float center_lat = (from_lat + to_lat) / 2;
00110         float center_lon = (from_lon + to_lon) / 2;
00111         //Go on recursively
00112         calcUpDown(from_lat, from_lon, center_lat, center_lon, up, down);
00113         calcUpDown(center_lat, center_lon, to_lat, to_lon, up, down);
00114     }
00115 }
